jobRecommendations.reasoning: Alamanda's internship experience as a Front End Intern, coupled with her HTML and CSS skills, makes her a suitable candidate for a Junior Front-End Developer role. The projects mentioned (Weather Forecast Application, Netflix Clone) demonstrate practical application of front-end technologies. While she has some full-stack experience, the stronger alignment is with front-end development based on the provided details.

The experience is brief (2 months total) and recent, but relevant, contributing to an experience score of 17% (2/12 months, assuming 12 months is the expected experience). The B.Tech degree is somewhat relevant, resulting in an education match score of 50%. Overall potential is moderate, considering the internship experience and basic front-end skills, leading to an overall score of 35.
